embeds.title: Macros for Farming!
embeds.description: We've created macros to automate some of the repetitive aspects of farming.

fields.name: How to Use:
fields.value:
1. Download and install [Auto Hotkey v2.0](https://www.autohotkey.com/).
2. Download and extract [Bloodpoint-Farming-Macros.zip](https://bloodpointfarming.github.io/Bloodpoint-Farming-Macros/Bloodpoint-Farming-Macros.zip).
3. Open an **.ahk** file. The macro is now running.
4. To turn off the macro; System Tray > Right click the icon > Exit.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
- Each macro can be easily edited using notepad.
- View the [README](https://github.com/BloodpointFarming/Bloodpoint-Farming-Macros/blob/main/README.md) on GitHub to find specifics about individual macros.
- Get updates by redownloading the macros in Step 2.
- While these macros are not intended to give a competitive advantage, they are at odds with the BHVR Terms of Use. Use them at your own risk.
